MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:37pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations and repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:39am on 13th February 2021.
